I don't know you from Adam, but you jump around a lot and make asumptions a=
bout what I believe and dont believe.

Kinda typicial aint it?=C2=A0 

I am=
 sorry=C2=A0I skimmed your post, as it is very much standard BS.

I am not =
in denial of anything, and if it is real I very much want to learn about it=
.=C2=A0 But this almost religious furvor you people have for this.=C2=A0 Th=
is unquestioning and going after anyone that presents you with fundamental =
logic and critical thinking, is a bit insulting.=C2=A0 

I am sorry if logi=
c,=C2=A0science, critical thinking and basic comon sence is threating to yo=
u.=C2=A0 That is not my intention in the least.=C2=A0 LOOK AND STOP=C2=A0 I=
F any of this is real, it needs to be tested and understood.=C2=A0 So far, =
I aint seen that crap! LOL

Your Guroue over there made the statment that n=
o contrabutions=C2=A0from Science have ever beinfited mankind.=C2=A0 Mull t=
hat statment over in your brain and think about how ignorant and assinie th=
at is.=C2=A0 That is a fools arron.

So I shut my mouth, yet here we are ag=
ain.=C2=A0 Bring me the body, Latin Ducuis=C2=A0Tetium (My Latin sucks) ?=
=C2=A0 Ask Frank, I am sure he is up on that.=C2=A0 In other words, show=C2=
=A0me.=C2=A0 Prove it.

I am sure I am a very bad person for asking for suc=
h things, and like I posted, I can deal with that.=C2=A0 All that oil spill=
ing out in the gulf is my fault LOL.=C2=A0 Where do you want to go with=C2=
=A0 this? LOL=C2=A0 I will take the blame.=C2=A0 But the QUESTION will rema=
in the same.=C2=A0 It will never change.

I am not in denial of anything, I=
 am asking for research, well real research.=C2=A0 So far I get your kinda =
crap.=C2=A0 You are not helping your cause.=C2=A0 I am not out to get you b=
uddy, so get off the stump!
=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of th=
e lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even though, becaus=
e of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=
=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far better to grasp the universe as it really=
 is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Car=
l Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just lo=
ok 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL

From: tim_woolworth <tim@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Se=
nt: Tue, June 1, 2010 10:59:04 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Nissan the movie.
=

=C2=A0 

I typically refrain from posting on the boards precisely because =
of people like you who feel that their insipid comments are worth hearing. =
There is nothing wrong with skepticism, hell, I have been in a relationship=
 with a laboratory scientist who is an atheist for going on four years now =
so I know what skepticism is supposed to sound like. I hear it everyday. Yo=
ur posts do not reflect the nature of skepticism, they reflect outright den=
ial. There is a difference betwixt the two, and it is not slight.

Why? Bec=
ause you claim to want irrefutable proof. Yet, you do nothing about it. As =
the old adage goes, it's time for you to sh*t or get off the pot. Get your =
hands on a ghost box and start experimenting. There are numerous radios to =
hack yourself, so do it already (granted, a hack is by no means up to par w=
ith a Frank's Box, Minibox, or any of the other guys doing this, but it wil=
l get you started). Then take the time to design controlled experiments to =
be implemented. Share your results. Write up a paper about it. Follow the s=
cientific method. There are ghost box users all over the country, so I am s=
ure you can find someone relatively close to you to work with if you actual=
ly want to take the time and responsibility of adding any knowledge to this=
 community. 

Do something, anything, other than gripe about not having eno=
ugh 'proof.' Epistemological knowledge has been debated by much better mind=
s for thousands of years and the very notion of proof is still, well, unpro=
vable. Exactly like science. What we believe today may not be true next yea=
r. Talk to any post-modernist in this post-modern society we live in and he=
 will tell you that the notion of scientific proof is meaningless precisely=
 because its very knowledge base is in constant flux. Gravity may be here t=
oday as a constant, but we cannot know with certainty the same will be true=
 tomorrow. This is why we have the scientific method to explore variables. =
This is why skepticism is good. 

We are all individuals, functioning indiv=
idually in this field. We do not have government funding. We do not have Ph=
D's working on this stuff. We have guys and girls, in their homes and shops=
, trying to understand the incomprehensible. Can you not realize that we al=
l know that the evidence we collect is instantly disprovable and will alway=
s be so? Just the simple fact of audio clips being posted here abnegates th=
e power of empiricism. As you have stated, you are a skeptic. No audio clip=
 will provide you with empirical evidence because you did not collect it yo=
urself and therefore too many variables involved make it easily dismissable=
 with just an iota of scientific rigor. We accept that, and you cannot. The=
refore, your mere presence alone on these forums is antagonistic to the wor=
k we do because we can never provide you with proof.

How can you expect pr=
oof when we do not even know with certainty whether we are talking to spiri=
ts, ET's, gods, or frickin unicorns.

How can you expect proof when the ver=
y nature of spirit and afterlife is wholly unprovable.

How can you expect =
proof in a yahoo forum? Does not the very nature of a forum defy all skepti=
cal enquiry?

And finally, speaking of forums, you are a guest in one run b=
y people who believe this to be true expressly for people who believe likew=
ise. 

So why are you here?

So please, do something to add to the communit=
y and quit relying on others to do it for you. If you keep relying on this =
forum to give you proof, you will always be disappointed because there is n=
o proof other than the audio clips you deny. 

Period.

For the other forum=
 users, I'm sorry to feed the troll this time. I know its best to let them =
starve, but once in a while you just might be able to shoo them away from t=
he bridge to allow a safe crossing (yes, pun intended).

Tim W.

<P><BR>I typically refrain from posting on t=
he boards precisely because of people like you who feel that their insipid =
comments are worth hearing. There is nothing wrong with skepticism, hell, I=
 have been in a relationship with a laboratory scientist who is an atheist =
for going on four years now so I know what skepticism is supposed to sound =
like. I hear it everyday. Your posts do not reflect the nature of skepticis=
m, they reflect outright denial. There is a difference betwixt the two, and=
 it is not slight.<BR><BR>Why? Because you claim to want irrefutable proof.=
 Yet, you do nothing about it. As the old adage goes, it's time for you to =
sh*t or get off the pot. Get your hands on a ghost box and start experiment=
ing. There are numerous radios to hack yourself, so do it already (granted,=
 a hack is by no means up to par with a Frank's Box, Minibox, or any of the=
 other guys doing this, but it will get you started). Then take the time to=
 design controlled
 experiments to be implemented. Share your results. Writ=
e up a paper about it. Follow the scientific method. There are ghost box us=
ers all over the country, so I am sure you can find someone relatively clos=
e to you to work with if you actually want to take the time and responsibil=
ity of adding any knowledge to this community. <BR><BR>Do something, anythi=
ng, other than gripe about not having enough 'proof.' Epistemological knowl=
edge has been debated by much better minds for thousands of years and the v=
ery notion of proof is still, well, unprovable. Exactly like science. What =
we believe today may not be true next year. Talk to any post-modernist in t=
his post-modern society we live in and he will tell you that the notion of =
scientific proof is meaningless precisely because its very knowledge base i=
s in constant flux. Gravity may be here today as a constant, but we cannot =
know with certainty the same will be true tomorrow. This is why we have the=
 scientific
 method to explore variables. This is why skepticism is good. <=
BR><BR>We are all individuals, functioning individually in this field. We d=
o not have government funding. We do not have PhD's working on this stuff. =
We have guys and girls, in their homes and shops, trying to understand the =
incomprehensible. Can you not realize that we all know that the evidence we=
 collect is instantly disprovable and will always be so? Just the simple fa=
ct of audio clips being posted here abnegates the power of empiricism. As y=
ou have stated, you are a skeptic. No audio clip will provide you with empi=
rical evidence because you did not collect it yourself and therefore too ma=
ny variables involved make it easily dismissable with just an iota of scien=
tific rigor. We accept that, and you cannot. Therefore, your mere presence =
alone on these forums is antagonistic to the work we do because we can neve=
r provide you with proof.<BR><BR>How can you expect proof when we do not ev=
en
 know with certainty whether we are talking to spirits, ET's, gods, or f=
rickin unicorns.<BR><BR>How can you expect proof when the very nature of sp=
irit and afterlife is wholly unprovable.<BR><BR>How can you expect proof in=
 a yahoo forum? Does not the very nature of a forum defy all skeptical enqu=
iry?<BR><BR>And finally, speaking of forums, you are a guest in one run by =
people who believe this to be true expressly for people who believe likewis=
e. <BR><BR>So why are you here?<BR><BR>So please, do something to add to th=
e community and quit relying on others to do it for you. If you keep relyin=
g on this forum to give you proof, you will always be disappointed because =
there is no proof other than the audio clips you deny. <BR><BR>Period.<BR><=
